message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115. I believe it offers a lot of value and would be a great purchase for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $110?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
